DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of the research is to test the short-term effects of the consumption of beverages containing phytochemicals and caffeine on several aspects of cognitive performance.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Phytochemicals on Aspects of Cognitive Performance
DOC.criteria: Subjects should be older than 17 and under 50 years of age, self report of good health Using any prescription medication including birth control; Report a history of any phschiatric condition; Report hypersinsitivity to caffeine; Have visual impairment that connot be corrected with glasses or contact lenses
DOC.keyword: cognitive performance after ingestion of test beverage
